posts.author: DMScreener
posts.content:
Looking at page 127 of the Player's Handbook, it states that ways functions based on your proficiency bonus and ability modifiers.

I think the 2024 changes to ways make it much more balanced compared to before.

In our last session, we encountered a Displacer Beast and tried to use ways to gain an advantage, but it didn't work out as planned.

In my campaign, we had a situation with ways that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
